rawText:
Page 1 of 2 
Sheetal Karnawadi 
Tech Architect 
Over 7 years of experience in software design
and development, specializing in web
applications using Java & React, data
engineering using Scala, plugin development,
generative AI, and agentic AI solutions using
Python. 
sheetalsrk05@gmail.com 
9880409897 
Bangalore 
linkedin.com/in/sheetal-karnawadi-
9395b7103 
SKILLS 
Java Python Spring Boot Fast API React Scala Apache Spark Kafka Elasticsearch 
MySQL Postgres Azure GCP Docker Kubernetes Redis Data warehouse Akka 
Cassandra 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Tech Architect 
HashedIn By Deloitte 
11/2024 - Present,  Bangalore 
Leading research and innovation efforts with a team of 8 developers to build AI solutions across multiple domains. 
Researching and Designing multimodal agents, including audio and video agents, to develop automated AI solutions. 
Upskilling in cutting-edge technologies to design innovative solutions and address critical process challenges. 
Exploring cloud solutions for deploying autonomous AI applications in distributed environments to ensure scalability. 
Architected backend solution engine service version 2.0 to support SDLC-driven workflows. 
Integrated LLM services to enable code generation, work breakdown, documentation, and migration tasks. 
Senior Software Engineer 
HashedIn By Deloitte 
03/2022 - 11/2024,  Bangalore 
Led two teams of 10 developers to design, develop, and deliver features for AI Assist plugin solutions. 
Researched and developed complex features for AI Assist 2.0, including authentication and LLM integrations. 
Designed and developed the backend solution engine version 1.0 to accelerate key SDLC activities using LLM services, including
code generation, work breakdown, document creation, and code migration. 
Led a team of 8 Java developers to deliver the full-scale Access Control Tower application with comprehensive stress testing
before releasing the application to production within the Walmart ecosystem. 
Designed and developed solutions to automate access control and stakeholder alerting in Access Control Tower, including
integrations with OAuth, PingFederate, LDAP, and ServiceNow. 
Implemented a solution to generate petabytes of data for stress testing, ensuring alignment with project commitments. 
Software Engineer 
HashedIn By Deloitte 
11/2020 - 02/2022,  Bangalore 
Upgraded a single-node Akka state machine to a multi-node Akka cluster using Kubernetes node discovery, enabling successful
production deployment. 
Implemented projection of Akka events from Cassandra to MySQL for seamless data integration with Tableau dashboards. 
Seamlessly migrated a legacy application to Walmart’s modern cloud-native platform using Akka cluster, maintaining full
functional behavior. 
Transformed a legacy Walmart application to a next-gen tech stack, utilizing Akka actors for event-driven financial data
aggregation during business operations. 
Learned Apache Spark and Developed data pipelines with centralized schema validation, transformed data with applied rules
and integrated with BigQuery to store the processed data. 
Developed a unified filter algorithm to manage filters for Reports REST APIs and integrated in React application. 
Achievements/Tasks 
Achievements/Tasks 
Achievements/Tasks 

Page 2 of 2 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Software Engineer 
Justbooks Solutions Pvt Ltd 
01/2018 - 10/2020,  Bangalore 
Developed five microservices for a book renting platform, including user management, catalog management, invoicing (MIS),
notification engine, search service. 
Built backend application with Spring Boot, MySQL, and Hibernate to handle complex transactional APIs efficiently. 
Integrated payment services, including Paytm and Razorpay, with backend systems for seamless transaction processing. 
Extended services with Elasticsearch to enable real-time search and fast data access across applications. 
Integrated AWS SES for email, Firebase for push notifications, and Ubona vendor for SMS to enable transaction-based user
communications across applications. 
EDUCATION 
BE - Bachelor Of Engineering 
Dayananda Sagar College Of Engineering 
08/2013 - 07/2017,  Bangalore 
Pre-University Education 
Alvas Pre-University College, Moodbidre 
06/2011 - 04/2013,  Moodbidre, Mangalore 
Achievements/Tasks

extractedData.name: Sheetal Karnawadi
extractedData.title: Tech Architect
extractedData.summary: Over 7 years of experience in software design and development, specializing in web applications using Java & React, data engineering using Scala, plugin development, generative AI, and agentic AI solutions using Python.

experience.description: Leading research and innovation efforts with a team of 8 developers to build AI solutions across multiple domains. Researching and Designing multimodal agents, including audio and video agents, to develop automated AI solutions. Upskilling in cutting-edge technologies to design innovative solutions and address critical process challenges. Exploring cloud solutions for deploying autonomous AI applications in distributed environments to ensure scalability. Architected backend solution engine service version 2.0 to support SDLC-driven workflows. Integrated LLM services to enable code generation, work breakdown, documentation, and migration tasks.

Led two teams of 10 developers to design, develop, and deliver features for AI Assist plugin solutions. Researched and developed complex features for AI Assist 2.0, including authentication and LLM integrations. Designed and developed the backend solution engine version 1.0 to accelerate key SDLC activities using LLM services, including code generation, work breakdown, document creation, and code migration. Led a team of 8 Java developers to deliver the full-scale Access Control Tower application with comprehensive stress testing before releasing the application to production within the Walmart ecosystem. Designed and developed solutions to automate access control and stakeholder alerting in Access Control Tower, including integrations with OAuth, PingFederate, LDAP, and ServiceNow. Implemented a solution to generate petabytes of data for stress testing, ensuring alignment with project commitments.

Upgraded a single-node Akka state machine to a multi-node Akka cluster using Kubernetes node discovery, enabling successful production deployment. Implemented projection of Akka events from Cassandra to MySQL for seamless data integration with Tableau dashboards. Seamlessly migrated a legacy application to Walmart’s modern cloud-native platform using Akka cluster, maintaining full functional behavior. Transformed a legacy Walmart application to a next-gen tech stack, utilizing Akka actors for event-driven financial data aggregation during business operations. Learned Apache Spark and Developed data pipelines with centralized schema validation, transformed data with applied rules and integrated with BigQuery to store the processed data. Developed a unified filter algorithm to manage filters for Reports REST APIs and integrated in React application.

Developed five microservices for a book renting platform, including user management, catalog management, invoicing (MIS), notification engine, search service. Built backend application with Spring Boot, MySQL, and Hibernate to handle complex transactional APIs efficiently. Integrated payment services, including Paytm and Razorpay, with backend systems for seamless transaction processing. Extended services with Elasticsearch to enable real-time search and fast data access across applications. Integrated AWS SES for email, Firebase for push notifications, and Ubona vendor for SMS to enable transaction-based user communications across applications.
